This method changes the ladybird's position depending on how the other ladybird interferes with this one.

Parameters:

turn

public boolean turn()
Turns the ladybird slightly towards the goal.

Returns:
True if the ladybird faces the goal.

go

public boolean go()
Makes the ladybird take one step towards the goal.

Returns:
True if the ladybird has reached the goal.
